---
title: "Row-bind Low and High Pressure tables"
output: html_notebook
---


```{r}
# load datasets
data("sk_tidy_lp")
data("sk_tidy_hp")

# add column "range" to indicate if low or high pressure
sk_tidy_lp["range"] <- "lp"
sk_tidy_hp["range"] <- "hp"

# bind the tables
sk_tidy <- rbind(sk_tidy_lp, sk_tidy_hp)

# convert column "set" to numeric
sk_tidy$set <- as.numeric(sk_tidy$set)

summary(sk_tidy)
```
```{r}
# save tidy data to Rda file
  save(sk_tidy, file = "../data/sk_tidy.rda", compress = "xz")
```
